channel.title: I need help putting server online
channel.description:
Please help I'am new to this and i really need help putting my server online i try to put it online it says this server is not online. :confused:
HELP please.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 05:40:06 AM[/size][hr]some one?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 05:40:43 AM[/size][hr]add my email at reece.cugini@hotmail.com well hotmail[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 05:49:36 AM[/size][hr]some one

item.title: I need help putting server online
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Make a no-ip at www.no-ip.com
Download No-ip Duc after that
Then go to your network connections, right click and click properties, hit the advanced tab, then hit settings again and then hit the exceptions tab, on the bottom it says ‘add’ click add and add a port for 43594 and make a name for it.
``
Then port forward (Dont know what router u got so cant help u here)

Hope some of these helped.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help putting server online
